body:
Comment 15 by **nfa106**: 
There is no 5.out file in that directory after the test has failed.

It's the gotest binary that SIGILLs.

Just by testing the binaries in the go/bin/ folder, I can conclude that:
cgo
ebnflint
godoc
gofix
gofmt
goinstall
gotest
gotype
govet
goyacc
hgpatch

All result in a SIGILL. But as I stated earlier if I go to the corresponding
go/src/cmd/<any> type make, then the local binary there is perfectly fine.
